summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2199 for the improvement of Main Street, from Fourth Avenue South to a point three hundred feet east of Twelfth Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same and by the construction of woodens walks, curbs and gutters; and Tenth Avenue South, from Main Street to Jackson Street, by the construction of wooden walks, curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 22111, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
